pages.text:
/about-us/
Home
About Us
Welcome to Corona Cigar Company's Online Discount Cigar Store
The Internet's largest and easiest to use virtual cigar store! Corona Cigar Company offers you the finest international, famous hand-made cigars, humidors, and cigar accessories at the absolute lowest possible price.
Save On Hundreds Of Famous Cigars From the World's Best International Cigar Makers
At Corona Cigar Company, we take pride in the fact that we are cigar fanatics just like you! That is why you will find the best selection of the rarest and finest premium cigars available anywhere in the world. Choose from famous brands like Padron, Davidoff, Drew Estate, Avo, Warped, Diamond Crown, Graycliff, and many more!
Plus we have special, limited edition cigars available exclusively to Corona Cigar Company from famous international cigar makers like Jorge Padron, Avo Uvezian, Litto Gomez, Christian Eiroa, Jonathan Drew, Carlos Fuente Jr., Nick Perdomo, Gurkha and Oliva.
The Best Cigar Selection, The Best Customer Service and Money Saving Discount Cigar Prices
But don't just take our word for it - Forbes Magazine selected Corona Cigar Company as "Best of the Web". Corona Cigar was voted as "Top 5 Internet Cigar Retailer" by Smoke Magazine. Cigar Aficionado magazine wrote "Corona Cigar Company...the largest, best stocked cigars shops in America".
Place an order online, by phone or visit one of Corona's five Central Florida cigar superstores & cigar bars and see for yourself why Corona Cigar Company is THE ULTIMATE CIGAR EXPERIENCE!
For the serious cigar connoisseur, Corona Cigar has one of the largest collections of extremely rare vintage, pre-embargo, pre-Castro Cuban cigars. To purchase, call or visit one of Corona's three retail cigar superstores.
Buy With Confidence With Corona Cigar's Iron-clad Guarantee
Your satisfaction is guaranteed on all products or your money back. Browse through hundreds of different international and famous name brand cigars and cigar accessories by clicking on the Products button or find your favorite cigar using our convenient Search feature.
You can order with confidence knowing that our site features secure order processing. This means your order is encrypted for your privacy and security - GUARANTEED. Our inventory, product selection and cigar specials are updated daily so bookmark our site and visit frequently.
Fast FREE Shipping On Orders Of $125+
After you place your order, items are shipped by the next business day (and in most cases the same day). If you live in Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Guam, or have an APO/FPO or A Post Office Box address (UPS DOES NOT DELIVER TO THESE) your order will arrive via Priority Mail at no extra charge. So wherever you live, your cigars are only a few days away! Be sure to take advantage of our FREE shipping offer. Just place an order totaling $125 or more, and shipping is FREE! Offer excludes international orders.
More Ways To Save...
Want to try new and famous cigar brands without purchasing a whole box? Then join Corona Cigar Company's
Cigars of the Month Club
and enjoy six different premium international cigars each month. As a member of Corona Cigar Company's "Cigars of the Month Club", you receive an additional 10% OFF of that month’s Cigars of the Month selection (discount provided as a code located inside of your pamphlet). Or you can join the
Premium Cigars of the Month Club
and receive 5 premium cigars each month and 10% OFF all future orders (online or in-store). The code will automatically be added to your account so you'll see the discount without having to worry about anything.
Corona Cigar Is Your Gift Headquarters
Looking for the perfect gift for the cigar connoisseur? Then check out our huge selection of Premium Cigar Assortments, Leather Cigar Cases, Cigar Ashtrays, and Cigar Humidors. There is a product to fit every budget.
We're Fighting To Protect Your Right To Smoke Cigars!
Corona Cigar Company plays an active role in ensuring you have the freedom to purchase and smoke a cigar. Corona Cigar Company is a Founding Sponsor and member of the board of directors for Cigar Rights of America. We are also a member of the board of directors for the International Premium Cigar & Pipe Retailer's Association (IPCPR).
Corona Cigar Company is a member and financial supporter of numerous organizations including: National Association of Tobacco Outlets, Cigar Association of America, U.S. Chamber of Commerce, Puerto Rican Chamber of Commerce, Orlando Chamber of Commerce, Seminole County Regional Chamber of Commerce, and the Orlando Convention Center & Visitor's Bureau.
We are 100% committed to protecting your freedom to enjoy a cigar. We will continue to oppose increases in cigar taxes and smoking bans so that you can enjoy (and afford) a fine cigar.
Enjoy your visit, buy lots of cigars, and be sure to tell your friends about Corona Cigar Company. Thank you for your business!
Sincerely,
Jeff Borysiewicz
President & Founder
Corona Cigar Co.
Florida Sun Grown

END EDIT

/events/
Home
Events
Events
Corona Cigar Co. Events
Stay informed about all of our upcoming events at Corona Cigar Co. by browsing the Event Calendar below. We offer the finest cigar and pairing events by the top cigar manufacturers and whiskey distillers. Take advantage of event-only deals and free offers at our exclusive events (*when offered*). Come out and sample premium cigars, whiskeys, scotches, bourbon, and enjoy the atmosphere of our luxurious cigar lounges while you talk with some of the industry's best!
Let us roll cigars at your next event!
CLICK HERE
to learn more!

/cigar-rolling-events/
Home
Cigar Rolling Events
LET US ROLL CIGARS AT YOUR NEXT EVENT!
Corona Cigar Company is here to enhance and elevate your next event with cigar rollers. These experienced and well-traveled Cuban master rollers and Cigar Aficionado bring to you the art and elegance of hand rolled cigars. Expect to be enamored and entertained with a unique presentation where you and your guest can delight in all aspects of the creation and witness the ultimate cigar experience.
Our cigar rollers will provide an inspiring blend of Cuban seed, Dominican grown, and long leaf filler cigars that all can enjoy on-site or take home. The experience is great for corporate events, hospitality suites, trade shows, golf tournaments, weddings, bachelor parties, in-store promotions, retirements, cigar nights, conventions, sporting events, and more.
Want us to roll cigars at your event? Please send us an email at
rollingevents@coronacigar.com
with your Name, Contact Information (Phone Number or Email), Date & Time of Event, Approximate Size of Event, What Kind of Event You're Having (Wedding, Corporate Party, etc.), and anything else you feel is important for us to know.

/cigars-of-the-month-club/
Home
Cigars of the Month Club
Two great options, one place to join the BEST Cigars of the Month Club!
Our Cigars of the Month program is fully automated! Your Cigars of the Month subscription will automatically renew right from your online profile, and you have full access to it. To view your subscription, please go to and Log In. Once logged in, click on ‘Account’ next to the person icon and then click on ‘Subscription’.
From there, you will see each of your Subscription orders, including the Status, Shipping Address, Summary, Contents, Payment Method, and Next Payment date. You also can Edit your Subscription (Update Payment Method, Update Shipping Address, Skip Recurrence, and Cancel Subscription).
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us via email at info@coronacigar.com or via phone at 1-888-702-4427.
**By purchasing either Cigars of the Month Clubs, you will automatically be enrolled in the COM Subscription. You will be charged on the first of the month until you choose to either cancel through your online profile or call in.**
Cigars of the Month Club
September
2025 Edition (
$34.95 + $7.95 Shipping
)
This month's selection includes
:
- Rocky Patel Quarter Century Robusto
- La Gloria Cubana Wavell Natural
- Avo Classic #2
- Casa Bella Toro Maduro
- Diesel Vintage Series Toro
- Four Kicks Capa Especial Corona Gorda
Join our Cigars of the Month Club and save 10% OFF purchases of that month's Cigars of the month selection!
(discount provided as a code inside of your pamphlet).
For just $34.95 a month plus $7.95 shipping, you'll receive an assortment of 6 specially selected premium cigars. Join the club today!
Premium Cigars of the Month Club
September 2025 Edition (
$59.95 + $7.95 Shipping
)
This month's selection includes
:
- Montecristo Nicaragua No. 2
- Diamond Crown Julius Caeser Corona
- Don Pepin Blue Generosos
- Warped Gran Reserva 1988
- El Septimo The Sacred Arts Collection Leo Da Vinci
Save 10% off your purchases of cigars and cigar accessories and enjoy some of the highest rated, most sought after cigars in the world when you join our Premium Cigars of the Month Club.
For only $59.95 a month plus $7.95 shipping, you'll receive an assortment of 5 specially selected super premium cigars. Plus you will receive 10% off all your orders as long as you're a member.
(Some exclusions apply)
Start enjoying the good stuff by joining our Premium Cigars of The Month Club today!
